solution_line_template: She bought {cheese_oz}ounces of cheese, {raspberries_oz}-ounce raspberries, {blueberries_oz} ounces of blueberries for a total of {cheese_oz}*3 = <<{cheese_oz}*3={total_oz}>>{total_oz} ounces

{ounces_per_pound} ounces are in 1 pound and she has {total_oz} ounces of food so she has {total_oz}/{ounces_per_pound} = <<{total_oz}/{ounces_per_pound}={pounds_from_ounces}>>{pounds_from_ounces} pounds of food

Those items are {pounds_from_ounces} pounds and she bought {bread_lb} pound of bread, {tomatoes_lb} pound of tomatoes, {zucchini_lb} pounds of zucchini and {chicken_lb} pounds of chicken for a total of {pounds_from_ounces}+{bread_lb}+{tomatoes_lb}+{zucchini_lb}+{chicken_lb} = <<{pounds_from_ounces}+{bread_lb}+{tomatoes_lb}+{zucchini_lb}+{chicken_lb}={total_pounds}>>{total_pounds} pounds of food
